question: What was the theme of the 11th edition of  Agrovision exhibition 2019 which was held in Nagpur?
option2: Boosting Agricultural Sector Through Technological Advancement
explanation: The 11th edition of  Agrovision exhibition 2019 was organized in Nagpur, Maharashtra. The theme of the event was "Smart Technologies for Sustainable Development". A booklet titled Agro Vision 2019 was released at that event.
